title: Fragment, 14th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: two integrated structures; plain weave plus plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 19.1 x 21.3 cm (7 1/2 x 8 3/8 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 15.9 x 14.6 cm (6 1/4 x 5 3/4 in.)
Warp x Weft (c): 9.5 x 11.7 cm (3 3/4 x 4 5/8 in.)
Warp x Weft (d): 10.2 x 14 cm (4 in. x 5 1/2 in.)
Warp x Weft (e): 5.7 x 7.6 cm (2 1/4 in. x 3 in.)
Warp x Weft (f): 5.4 x 4.4 cm (2 1/8 x 1 3/4 in.)
description: A band of affronted and addorsed birds, band of pomegranates and band of small animals in rose and gold.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 14th century.
14th century. Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: two integrated structures; plain weave plus plain weave. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-328-a/f.
